metadata.name: YouTube
metadata.description: Search for videos and extract various details from YouTube videos.

post.description: Searches for the YouTube videos with a search keyword.

search_term.title: Search Term
search_term.description: A search term for the Youtube video search, example: "Agentic Automation"

max_results.title: Max Results
max_results.description: How many results to return, default 3.

schema.title: Response for Search
schema.description: Youtube video links that match the search criteria. The return value is a json string.

post.description: Extracts the transcription of a Youtube video. Only works if subtitles or captions are available for the video.

video_url.title: Video Url
video_url.description: Youtube video URL as a complete URL, example: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOUR_VIDEO_ID"

schema.title: Response for Get Transcript
schema.description: Complete transcription of the youtube video
